title: Seriously, there is no excuse that the new queue and champion select system is so flawed.
body:
It was on PBE so long, people told RIOT about the flaws, NOTHING changed. It got into live game as it was on PBE. 

The final proof that RIOT just stoped giving a damn and just does whatever they want, no matter the community feedback. 

Remember when they claimed these "boards" would improve their ways to get community feedback when they changed from the forums, again against the will of the community? 
Now where are they? 
People told them that the new system needs autolock, so we can think. They didnt care. 
People told them not to kill Solo queue. They didnt care. 
People told them Team builder was a great thing that should stay. They didnt care. 

These three words litterally describe RIOT after LoL became popular and they didnt had to pretend any more: 
They dont care.

replies.body:
For the first week of it we couldn't get a game started.  lolclient.exe would constantly crash, if that didn't happen, people wouldn't lock in, if it wasn't that, there was also some mysterious boogeybug that would just close the champ select.
Then games could start, but it still had bugs relating to when people queued together, crashing champ select.
Then more bugs that involved seemingly anyone would crash champ select.

It seems pretty bug-free right now compared to how it was on PBE, and people voiced their concerns about choosing a ward skin, chroma color, and even purchasing skins in champ select, along with some other things which they've said they are working on now.  You can view their update/responses to concerns _**ON THE BOARDS HERE:**_
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/HGblb9fH-the-2016-ranked-season-updates-on-dynamic-ranked-and-your-feedback
Well, in EUW, it has already been disabled cause, guess why, it was causing problems...
TBH I don't understand why TB had to go. Remove blind pick instead if you don't want more than 3 normal queues on SR.

And if they lock in they aren't afk either.

Thats stupid. if they clicked on a champion, they are not AFK. When you clicked on a Champion but couldnt lock before, that is is most cases because you actually tried to communicate with your team and switched Champion last second, or because you couldnt decide in time because that crappy system doesnt allow you to watch your champions and think about a counterpick for the enemy champs or a supporting pick for your team until your timer runs, again,. because RIOT is sooooooo proud to show you the splas arts instead of letting you do something productive during your teammates picks.

Riot is allowed to disagree with you, you know.

Hell, they're not even disagreeing with one of your points; they're adding in solo queue back. Hell, it's even more solo now!

I agree, when I was playing in the beta with this new system early on there where mixed results and relatively poor ones from groups of 2-4 people. They didn't listen to much, if any, of the DETAILED like I mean some people went over the system with a comb, and with the glitches lasting nearly the ENTIRE time of beta they pushed it out without fixing any of it! That just sucks!
